COMMON.PROMPT: What would you like to do?

START.SUGGESTION: You can ask me to deal, or for help.

HELP.DESCRIPTION: Blackjack Trainer is a skill to help you learn Basic Strategy for the card game Blackjack. I will deal you a hand and you must say the correct move.
HELP.MORE: Would you like to hear more?
HELP.RULES: I will assess your move based on Basic Strategy odds, assuming the following rules: Dealer must hit on soft 17; You may split at any time up to 4 hands; You may double at any time; You may surrender.

DEAL.DEALT: You were dealt the {{card1}} and {{card2}}. Dealer is showing the {{dealerCard}}.
DEAL.SUGGESTION: You can say Blackjack actions like 'Hit' or 'Stay'.
DEAL.PLAY_AGAIN: Would you like me to deal again?
